SEARCH
Package com.fetch.sdetchallenge.tests.base

Class TestBase

java.lang.Object
com.fetch.sdetchallenge.tests.base.TestBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
BalanceScaleTest
public class TestBase extends Object
Base class for test setup and teardown. Provides methods for initializing and closing the WebDriver, and for opening specific pages.
